summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 6, Waddell's Madrona Park Addition, being the alley between East Denny Way and Florence Court and extending from Florence Court to 37th Avenue North; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6803 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
